post.body: hope you woke up on the right side of the bed after your nap! you kno, the side where soup from a can comes out perfect? ;D
just don't get a puppy, too. after we got our puppy, my boyfriend didn't want to have anything to do with our cat! poor thing!
I'm thinking we'd be in trouble? and here I am, saying that, when it took me several years to get one!

love that movie.. and sam! =)
not in my opinion.but just curious, what don't you like about it?
happy holidays! great snowman! =)
gonna watch the housewives and then sleep..
seriously think something wrong with me.went beyond thinking about work to logging on and working. probably cuz boyfriend's not home. so sad
I'm at home-- after a long day-- and I'm thinking about work. WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME??
my supervisor is taking us out for manicures tomorrow after brunch.. fun!
it's snowing!! didn't think I'd be this excited, but it's so pretty..
making myself go to sleep. waking up early.. nite!
still tired. as usual, delaying sleep! for loving sleep as much as I do, I always prolong it! guess I want to stay up as late as possible..
why does hayley insist on terrorizing talullah?
lol. fat old husband walking over. walking down the road. left foot, right foot, left foot, right foot..
note to self: don't leave food on counter!
do dogs really get sick from chocolate?left plate of choc chip cookies on counter.half went missing when I wasn't looking in bout 2 secs
listening to high fidelity soundtrack. forgot how good it was and watching the movie this weekend reminded me..
I'm a little tired today. it seems everyday since September has been a long day at work. want to escape into a calgon commercial.
listening to Hayley sniff loudly, trying to get to her chew toy under the tv stand. which, coincidentally, is her chew toy, too!
gonna watch dexter and then take some lovely cough juice so I can sleep peacefully..
if we wanted us some woosies, then we would have named them dr quinn & medicine woman
Enjoying the holidays with family. Hope everyone is doing the same!!
Happy Eggnog Day!!
about to go to my hairdresser.. am sick again! why'd I go and do that?
finished wrapping presents. realized forgot some people! oh boy.
still no wrapping. uploading pics.
am being lazy. told myself I would finish wrapping presents. fa la la la la

making myself stop now. nite!
the die is cast. I'm a lily.
thinking about the olden times..
